insights_classified.text: AI revenue reached $4.1 billion in Q1, up 77% YoY, driven by custom XPU accelerators.
Management projects an AI serviceable addressable market (SAM) of $60-90 billion by fiscal 2027.
VMware integration focuses on subscription models, with 70% of revenue from VMware Cloud Foundation.
Custom silicon design capabilities create high switching costs for hyperscale customers.
Operating margins could expand to 40-45% as higher-margin AI and software segments gain revenue share.
